font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 茅屋： a small, wretched, and often dirty house
【例】The same house in a neighborhood of $500, 000 homes may feel like a hovel.
【近】 cabin, camp, hooch, hut, hutch, hutment, shanty
【记】 hole + 音：屋→山洞一样的屋；音：猴窝，猴屋；音：后屋，前屋很大很宽畅，后屋是茅舍
，很脏；
